name: Insect Simulator
description:
It Is An Open World Insect Life simulator.

    Choose an insect from those presented in the game. Each insect has its own characteristics. Upgrade the nest, increase the number of the colony. Gather things around the map to expand your nest and colony. Fight other insects and capture their nests. You have the option to recruit companions as a personal squad for easier progression through the game:

  • several Types Of Insects

  • Several types of nests with the possibility of updating

  • Increase the number of your colony

  • Recruit part of the colony to your companions

  • Сollect surrounding things and use them for upgrades
